Description:
Charger logistics Inc. is a world- class asset-based carrier with locations across North America. With over 20 years of experience providing the best logistics solutions, Charger logistics has transformed into a world-class transport provider and continue to grow.We are looking for dynamic individuals with a passion for helping people to join our fast-paced logistics team. We are entrepreneurial-minded organization that welcomes and support individual ideas and strategies.Responsibilities:Communicating with customers and responding to their queries (via phone, email or fax) in a professional and timely manner.
Track and Trace large volume of customer orders
Entering, updating and processing customer orders on various interfaces.
Ensure daily delivery schedules are adhered to, and all necessary documentation is returned to head office in an accurate and timely manner
Handle client complaints provide appropriate solutions and alternative within the time limits: follow up to ensure resolution.
Ensure and confirm pickup and delivery appointment for drivers
Communicate specific freight requirements and procedures to drivers and ensure customers are well informed.
Research and resolve all transactional problems to ensure reporting is reconciled in a timely manner
Maintain co-operative working relationships among team and internal staffJob Details
